A Slayer bell is a piece of Slayer equipment that can be rung to lure molanisks off of walls at level 39 Slayer. Slayer bells can be purchased for 150 coins from any slayer master.

A player ringing a slayer bell.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
13 June 2019
(update)

The chat message about the molanisk bell resounding loudly throughout the cavern has been added to the game filter.

6 June 2013
(update)

The molanisk bell will no longer interfere with your walk animation in the Duel Arena.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.

[[File:Slayer bell detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''Slayer bell''' is a piece of [[Slayer equipment]] that can be rung to lure [[molanisk]]s off of walls at level 39 [[Slayer]]. Slayer bells can be purchased for 150 [[coins]] from any [[slayer master]].

[[File:Ringing slayer bell.gif|150px|thumb|left|A player ringing a slayer bell.]]
